entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
